faqs.question: What is the difference between a One Person Company and Private Limited Company?
faqs.answer: One person company requires only one Director to incorporate the company while a Private Limited Company requires two Directors.

faqs.question: Can an NRI register a One Person Company?
faqs.answer: An OPC can only be registered by a citizen of India.

faqs.question: How much capital is required to start an OPC?
faqs.answer: There is no minimum paid-up capital required to start an OPC but It will need an authorized share capital of Rs. 1 lakh.

faqs.question: Should an OPC be renewed every year?
faqs.answer: No, an OPC does not require renewal every year. An OPC continues its existence until the main Director dissolves the company.

faqs.question: If I have questions regarding my documents or the process, how can I ask?
faqs.answer: Once you purchase any product from the ezyLegal website, you will be credited minutes in your account. You can use these minutes to connect with the Lawyer and ask questions and take guidance from the Expert.

faqs.question: How to register an OPC in India?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal can help you get your OPC registered and provide you with the right legal guidance. You can schedule your Consultation with an ezyLegal Lawyer and know the detailed process and advantages of registering an OPC Company.

faqs.question: How will I know the status of the registration process?
faqs.answer: Status updates will be available on the ezyLegal website (www.ezylegal.in) in your secured Account. Additionally, you will be notified on email and WhatsApp.
